content: Which resource would map best for responses to the Oncology Care Model's eligibility and enrollment information? We've been considering QuestionnaireResponse but wanted to know if someone is already handling it a different way?

Is this for covering eligibility assessment data capture and scoring?
Makes sense to me. (doing it in the community/mental health spaces)

An extract from one of our community extracts in quesitonnaire format:
http://smartq.azurewebsites.net/Home/Survey?questionnaireId=https%3A%2F%2Fuatfhir.connectingcare.com%2Ffhir%2FQuestionnaire%2Fdemo-scoring2&fhirServiceUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fuatfhir.connectingcare.com%2Ffhir%2F
